Item.Line: (This is the dream, the goal, the pinnacle of any musican in the world.)
(On the prestigous stage of the Vienna Concert Hall, numerous grand masters performed and awed their audiences with their inparalleled skill and talent.)
Ladies and Gentlemen, welcome to the 100th International Conducting Competition!
Since the legendary couple 10 years ago, no one has ever won the first title in this competition.
Can anyone make it this year?
